motorcycles.description: All variants of the Honda Africa Twin (CRF1000) from 2016 to 2019.
motorcycles.name: Honda Africa Twin 2016 - 2019

tasks.description: Inspect the fuel line.
tasks.name: Fuel line

tasks.description: Inspect the throttle operation.
tasks.name: Throttle operation
tasks.notes:
With the engine off, check that the throttle rotates smoothly from fully closed to fully open.
If the throttle does not move smoothly, or close automatically, have the motorcycle inspected by your dealer.

tasks.description: Replace the air cleaner element.
tasks.name: Air cleaner
tasks.notes:
The air filter cannot be cleaned without degrading its performance. If the filter becomes dirty, replace it with a new one.
Service more frequently when riding in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Clean the crankcase breather.
tasks.name: Crankcase breather
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when riding in rain or at full throttle.

tasks.description: Inspect and/or replace the spark plugs.
tasks.name: Spark plugs
tasks.notes:
Inspect (clean, adjust, lubricate, or replace if necessary) every 25600 km / 16000 miles.
Replace every 51200 km / 32000 miles.
Standard spark plug: NGK SILMAR8A9S
Spark plug gap: 0.03 - 0.04 in (0.8 - 0.9 mm)

tasks.description: Inspect the valve clearance.
tasks.name: Valve clearance

tasks.description: Replace the engine oil and filter.
tasks.name: Engine oil
tasks.notes:
Replace the filter at the initial oil change and then at every other oil change.
Use SAE 10W-30 with classification SG or higher. JASO T 903 standard: MA.
Do not use resource conserving or energy conserving oil.

tasks.description: Inspect the radiator coolant.
tasks.name: Radiator coolant

tasks.description: Replace the radiator coolant.
tasks.name: Radiator coolant

tasks.description: Replace the clutch oil filter (if equipped).
tasks.name: Clutch oil filter

tasks.description: Inspect the engine idle speed.
tasks.name: Engine idle speed

tasks.description: Inspect the cooling system.
tasks.name: Cooling system

tasks.description: Inspect the secondary air supply system.
tasks.name: Secondary air supply system

tasks.description: Inspect the evaporative emission control system.
tasks.name: Evaporative emission system

tasks.description: Inspect and lubricate the drive chain.
tasks.name: Drive chain
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when riding off-road.

tasks.description: Inspect the drive chain slider.
tasks.name: Drive chain slider

tasks.description: Inspect the brake fluid.
tasks.name: Brake fluid

tasks.description: Replace the brake fluid.
tasks.name: Brake fluid

tasks.description: Inspect the brake pads wear.
tasks.name: Brake pads wear

tasks.description: Inspect the brake system.
tasks.name: Brake system

tasks.description: Inspect the brake light switch.
tasks.name: Brake light switch

tasks.description: Inspect the brake lock operation.
tasks.name: Brake lock operation

tasks.description: Inspect the headlight aim.
tasks.name: Headlight aim

tasks.description: Inspect the clutch lever freeplay (if equipped).
tasks.name: Clutch system
tasks.notes: Inpect and adjust the clutch lever freeplay at 3/8 - 13/16 in (10 - 20 mm). Check the clutch cable for any sign of wear.

tasks.description: Inspect the side stand.
tasks.name: Side stand

tasks.description: Inspect the suspension.
tasks.name: Suspension

tasks.description: Clean the spark arrestor (if equipped).
tasks.name: Spark arrestor

tasks.description: Inspect and tighten the nuts, bolts, and fasteners.
tasks.name: Nuts, bolts, fasteners
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when riding off-road.

tasks.description: Inspect the wheels and tires.
tasks.name: Wheels / Tires
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when riding off-road.

tasks.description: Inspect the steering head bearings.
tasks.name: Steering head bearings

motorcycles.description: All variants of the KTM 790 Adventure from 2019 to 2020.
motorcycles.name: KTM 790 Adventure 2019 - 2020

tasks.description: Read out the trouble code memory using the KTM diagnostics tool.
tasks.name: Trouble code memory

tasks.description: Program the shift shaft sensor.
tasks.name: Shift shaft sensor

tasks.description: Check that the electrical system is functionning properly.
tasks.name: Electrical system

tasks.description: Change the engine oil and the oil filter, clean the oil screens.
tasks.name: Engine oil
tasks.notes:
Use SAE 10W/50, JASO T903 MA2. Fully synthetic oil.
Recommended: MOTOREX ® Power Synt 4T

tasks.description: Check the front and rear brake linings, and the discs,.
tasks.name: Brake linings and discs
tasks.notes:
Check the front brake linings.
Check the rear brake linings.
Check brake discs.

tasks.description: Check the brake lines for damage and leakage.
tasks.name: Brake lines

tasks.description: Check the brake fluid level
tasks.name: Brake fluid

tasks.description: Change brake fluid.
tasks.name: Brake fluid
tasks.notes:
Use DOT 4 or DOT 5.1.
Recommended: 
- Castrol REACT PERFORMANCE DOT 4
- MOTOREX ® Brake Fluid DOT 5.1

tasks.description: Check the free travel of the clutch lever.
tasks.name: Clutch level

tasks.description: Check the free travel of the brake lever.
tasks.name: Brake lever

tasks.description: Check the shock absorber and forks for leaks.
tasks.name: Shock absorber and forks
tasks.notes: Perform service as needed and depending on how the vehicle is used.

tasks.name: Dust boots

tasks.description: Check the steering head bearing play.
tasks.name: Steering head bearing play

tasks.description: Check the tire condition and pressure.
tasks.name: Tires

tasks.description: Retighten the spokes.
tasks.name: Spokes

tasks.name: Spokes

tasks.description: Check the rim run-out.
tasks.name: Rims

tasks.description: Check the chain, rear sprocket, engine sprocket, and chain guide.
tasks.name: Chain and sprockets

tasks.description: Check the chain tension.
tasks.name: Chain tension

tasks.description: Change the spark plugs.
tasks.name: Spark plugs
tasks.notes:
Spark plugs: NGK LMAR9AI‐10
Electrode gap: 1.0 mm (0.039 in)

tasks.description: Check the valve clearance
tasks.name: Valve clearance

tasks.description: Check the coolant fill level and antifreeze.
tasks.name: Coolant and antifreeze

tasks.description: Check the cables for damage and for routing without kinks.
tasks.name: Cables

tasks.description: Change the air filter and clean the air filter box.
tasks.name: Air filter

tasks.name: Fuel pressure

tasks.description: Check the headlight setting.
tasks.name: Headlight setting

tasks.description: Check that the radiator fan is functionning properly.
tasks.name: Radiator fan

tasks.description: Check the vehicle is roadworthy and take a test ride.
tasks.name: Final check

tasks.description: Read out the error memory after the test ride using the KTM dignostics tool.
tasks.name: Error memory

tasks.description: Set the service interval display.
tasks.name: Service interval display.

tasks.description: Make a service entry in KTM Dealers.net
tasks.name: Service entry

tasks.description: Check the frame.
tasks.name: Frame

tasks.description: Check the link fork.
tasks.name: Link fork

tasks.description: Check/clean the oil nozzle for clutch lubrication.
tasks.name: Oil nozzle

tasks.description: Check the fork bearing for play.
tasks.name: Fork bearing

tasks.description: Check the wheel bearing for play.
tasks.name: Wheel bearing

tasks.description: Change the coolant
tasks.name: Coolant

tasks.description: Empty the drainage hoses.
tasks.name: Drainage hoses

tasks.description: Check all the hoses and sleeves for cracking, leaks, and incorrect routing.
tasks.name: Hoses
tasks.notes: e.g. fuel, cooling, bleeder, drainage, etc.

tasks.description: Grease all moving parts and check for smooth operation.
tasks.name: Grease
tasks.notes: e.g., side stand, hand lever, chain, ...

tasks.description: Check the tightness of the safety-relevant screws and nuts which are easily accessible.
tasks.name: Screws and nuts

motorcycles.description: The injected version of the Royal Enfield Himalayan from 2016 to now.
motorcycles.name: Royal Enfield Himalayan 2016+

tasks.description: Replace the engine oil and filter.
tasks.name: Engine oil
tasks.notes:
Check the oil level every 1000km / 600 miles.

Recommended oil: SAE 15W 50 API SL Grade JASO MA 2 Semi Synthetic.
Capacity: 2.3 Ltrs. (First Fill only ) 2.0 Ltrs. Approx. (during oil & filter element replacement in periodical
maintenance).

tasks.description: Clean the oil strainer on crankcase LH.
tasks.name: Engine oil strainer on crankcase

tasks.description: Inspet and adjust inlet and exhaust tappet setting.
tasks.name: Tappet setting

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the rubber intake hose.
tasks.name: Rubber hose, inlet manifold
tasks.notes: Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 12 months, 10000km.

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the oil cooler inlet and outlet pipes.
tasks.name: Oil cooler inlet & outlet pipes
tasks.notes: Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 18 months, 15000km.

tasks.description: Clean and adjust the spark plug.
tasks.name: Spark plug
tasks.notes:
Spark plug: Bosch - UR5CC
Spark plug gap: 0.7 to 0.8 mm

- Remove spark plug using the plug spanner and tommy bar.
- Clean the insulator tip and electrodes of the plug carefully.
- Clean & adjust electrode gap every 500 km if required and replace every 15,000 kms.
- Refit the spark plug on the cylinder head.

tasks.description: Inspect HT leads for cracks and replace if necessary.
tasks.name: HT leads
tasks.notes: Inspect every 6 months, 5000 km. Replace every 36 months, 30000km.

tasks.description: Inspect the fuel hose and related parts. Replace if necessary.
tasks.name: Fuel Hose, Clip/ Injector ‘O’ ring/ Seal
tasks.notes:
Fuel Hose & Clip/ Injector ‘O’ ring/ Seal Ring.

Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 18 months, 15000km.

tasks.description: Inspect the fuel pump screw tighness.
tasks.name: Fuel pump

tasks.description: Clean or replace the air filter element.
tasks.name: Air filter element
tasks.notes: Clean every 6 months, 5000 km. Replace every 12 months, 10000km.

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the accelarator cable.
tasks.name: Accelerator Cable
tasks.notes: Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 12 months, 10000km.

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the rubber hose, air filter to throttle body.
tasks.name: Rubber Hose, air filter to throttle body
tasks.notes: Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 12 months, 10000km.

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the PAV pipes & hose clip.
tasks.name: PAV pipes & hose clip
tasks.notes: Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 30 months, 25000km.

tasks.description: Clean the throttle body using cleaning spray.
tasks.name: Throttle body
tasks.notes: Use carb cleaner, carb click, or fuel line cleaner spray.

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the clutch cable.
tasks.name: Clutch Cable
tasks.notes: Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 12 months, 10000km.

tasks.description: Adjust the clutch free play.
tasks.name: Clutch free play

tasks.description: Verify there is no clutch slippage.
tasks.name: Clutch no slippage

tasks.description: Replace the clutch plates.
tasks.name: Clutch plates

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the cam chain, chain pads, and auto chain tensioner.
tasks.name: Cam chain, pads and tensioner
tasks.notes: Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 60 months, 50000km.

tasks.description: Perform compression test for the intet / exhaust valve seating.
tasks.name: Inlet / exhaust valve seating

tasks.description: Inspect, adjust, and lubricate the steering head bearings.
tasks.name: Steering head bearings
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the front fork oil.
tasks.name: Front fork oil
tasks.notes: Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 18 months, 15000km.

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the fuel pipe.
tasks.name: Fuel pipe
tasks.notes: Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 12 months, 10000km.

tasks.description: Clean the battery terminals and apply petroleum jelly.
tasks.name: Battery terminals

tasks.description: Inspect the earth wire eyelet tightness.
tasks.name: Earth wire eyelet tightness

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the hydraulic brake fluid (front & rear).
tasks.name: Hydraulic brake fluid
tasks.notes:
Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 12 months, 10000km.
Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the hydraulic brake hose and washers (front & rear).
tasks.name: Hydraulic brake hose and washers
tasks.notes:
Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 24 months, 20000km.
Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the brake pads (front & rear).
tasks.name: Brake pads
tasks.notes:
Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 12 months, 10000km.
Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Inspect the tire wear pattern (front & rear).
tasks.name: Tire wear
tasks.notes:
Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.
Tire to be replaced if the tyre wear identification mark reached.

tasks.description: Inspect the spokes tightness / wheel rim run out (front & rear).
tasks.name: Spokes tightness / wheel rim run out
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Inspect front and rear wheel bearings for play.
tasks.name: Wheel bearings
tasks.notes:
Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 30 months, 25000km.
Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Inspect and lubricate the swingarm pivot bearings. Replace if necessary.
tasks.name: Swingarm pivot bearings
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Inspect and lubricate the rear suspension linkages. Replace if necessary.
tasks.name: Rear suspension linkages
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Clean, lubricate, and adjust the rear drive chain. Replace if necessary.
tasks.name: Rear drive chain
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the drive chain and sprockets set.
tasks.name: Drive chain and sprockets set
tasks.notes:
Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 12 months, 10000km.
Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the rear wheel cush drive rubbers.
tasks.name: Rear wheel cush drive rubbers
tasks.notes:
Inspect every 6 months, 5000km. Replace every 12 months, 10000km.
Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Inspect and tighten all the mounting fasteners in vehicle.
tasks.name: All mounting fasteners
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Lubricate the hand levers, centre stand, side stand, rider & pillion foot rest, pivots & gear shift levers.
tasks.name: Lubrication
tasks.notes: Service more frequently when ridden in unusually wet or dusty areas.

tasks.description: Inspect or replace the evaporative emission equipment rubber hoses.
tasks.name: Evaporative emission equipment

motorcycles.description: All variants of the Suzuki DR650 from 1996 to now.
motorcycles.name: Suzuki DR650 1996+

tasks.description: Measure and adjust the valve clearance.
tasks.name: Valve clearance

tasks.description: Clean and oil the air filter.
tasks.name: Air cleaner element
tasks.notes:
Clean with soapy water. Oil using engine oil. Replace air filter if necessary.
Clean air filter drain cap.

tasks.description: Inspect the spark plugs.
tasks.name: Spark plugs
tasks.notes:
Inspect the spark plugs and replace if necessary. Spark plug gap: 0.7 - 0.8 mm (0.028 - 0.031 in)
Recommended replacement 24 months/12000km.
Standard spark plugs NGK CR10E / Denso U31ESR-N.
If the plugs are wet or very dark, use NGK CR9E / Denso U27ESR-N

tasks.description: Adjust the idle speed.
tasks.name: Idle speed
tasks.notes: Warm engine and adjust to 1400-1600 r/min.

tasks.description: Inspect the fuel hose.
tasks.name: Fuel hose
tasks.notes: Replace every 4 years.

tasks.description: Inspect the clutch cable.
tasks.name: Clutch adjustment
tasks.notes: The play of the clutch lever should be 10 - 15 mm (0.4 - 0.6 in) measured at the clutch lever end.

tasks.description: Replace the engine oil and filter.
tasks.name: Engine oil
tasks.notes:
Use SAE 10W-40 oil.
API: SG, SH, SJ, or SL. JASO: MA.
Do not use "Energy Conserving" oil.
The oil filter must be changed with every other oil change (12000 km / 7500 miles or 24 months)

tasks.description: Clean the fuel valve strainer.
tasks.name: Fuel valve strainer

tasks.description: Clean and lubricate the chain.
tasks.name: Drive chain
tasks.notes:
Clean and lubricate the drive chain every 1000 km / 600 miles.
Inspect and adjust the chain every 6000 km / 4000 miles, or 12 months.

The slack of the drive chain should be measured at the middle point between the chain buffer and the rear sprocket. The slack should be 30 - 45 mm (1.2 - 1.8 in.).
Rear axle nut tightening torque: 110 N⋅m (79.5 lbf-ft).

tasks.description: Inspect the brakes.
tasks.name: Brakes
tasks.notes:
Inspect the fluid level (front and back).
Inspect the brake system and hoses for signs of fluid leakage.
The brake lever and pedal should have proper stroke and be firm at all times.
Check the wear of the disc brake pads.

tasks.description: Replace the brake hoses.
tasks.name: Replace brake hoses

tasks.description: Replace the brake fluid.
tasks.name: Replace brake fluid
tasks.notes: Clean the filler cap before removing. Use only DOT4 brake fluid from a sealed container.

tasks.description: Inspect and clean the steering.
tasks.name: Steering
tasks.notes: Inspect and clean, adjust, replace or lubricate as necessary.

tasks.description: Inspect and clean the front forks.
tasks.name: Front fork
tasks.notes: Inspect and clean, adjust, replace or lubricate as necessary.

tasks.description: Inspect and clean the rear suspension.
tasks.name: Rear suspension
tasks.notes: Inspect and clean, adjust, replace or lubricate as necessary.

tasks.description: Inspect the tires and adjust pressure.
tasks.name: Tires
tasks.notes: Inspect and clean, adjust, replace or lubricate as necessary.

tasks.description: Clean the spark arrestor (if equipped).
tasks.name: Spark arrestor

tasks.description: Tighten the exhaust and muffler bolts.
tasks.name: Exhaust pipe and muffler bolts

tasks.description: Tighten the chassis nuts and bolts.
tasks.name: Chassis nuts and bolts

tasks.description: Lubricate the lubrication points.
tasks.name: Lubrication

motorcycles.description: The S/SM variants of the Suzuki DRZ400 from 2001 to now.
motorcycles.name: Suzuki DRZ400 S/SM 2001+

tasks.description: Clean and oil the air filter.
tasks.name: Air cleaner element
tasks.notes: Inspect the air cleaner element for tears. Clean with nonflammable cleaning solvent. Oil using motor oil. Replace air filter every 18000 km / 11000 miles.

tasks.description: Tighten the exhaust pipe nut and bolt and muffler nut and bolts.
tasks.name: Exhaust pipe and muffler bolts

tasks.description: Inspect the tappet clearance.
tasks.name: Tappet clearance
tasks.notes:
Tappet clearance when cold:
IN: 0.10 - 0.20 mm (0.0039 - 0.0079 in)
EX: 0.20 - 0.30 mm (0.0079 - 0.0118 in)

tasks.description: Inspect the spark plugs.
tasks.name: Spark plugs
tasks.notes:
Inspect the spark plugs and replace if necessary.
Spark plug gap: 0.7 - 0.8 mm (0.028 - 0.031 in)
Recommended replacement 12 months / 12000km / 7500 miles.
Standard spark plugs: NGK CR8E / Denso U24ESR-N.
Cold type: NGK CR9E / Denso U27ESR-N.
Hot type: NGK CR7E / Denso U22ESR-N

tasks.description: Clean the spark arrestor (if equipped).
tasks.name: Spark arrestor

tasks.description: Inspect the fuel hose.
tasks.name: Fuel hose
tasks.notes: Replace every 4 years.

tasks.description: Replace the engine oil.
tasks.name: Engine oil
tasks.notes:
Use SAE 10W-40 oil.
API: SG, SH, SJ, or SL. JASO: MA.
Do not use "Energy Conserving" oil.
The oil filter must be changed initially after 1 month or 1000 km / 600 miles. Then every 18 months or 18000 km / 11000 miles.

tasks.description: Inspect the engine oil hoses.
tasks.name: Engine oil hoses

tasks.description: Inspect the carburetor.
tasks.name: Carburetor

tasks.description: Replace the engine coolant.
tasks.name: Engine coolant

tasks.description: Inspect the radiator hose.
tasks.name: Radiator hose

tasks.description: Inspect the clutch.
tasks.name: Clutch

tasks.description: Clean and lubricate the chain.
tasks.name: Drive chain
tasks.notes:
Clean and lubricate the drive chain every 1000 km / 600 miles.
Inspect and adjust the chain every 6000 km / 4000 miles, or 6 months.

Adjust the slack to 40 - 50 mm (1.6 - 2.0 in.).
20-pitch max length: 319.4 mm (12.57 in).

tasks.name: Brakes

tasks.description: Inspect the brake fluid.
tasks.name: Brake fluid
tasks.notes: Replace every 2 years.

tasks.description: Inspect the brake hoses.
tasks.name: Brake hoses
tasks.notes: Replace every 4 years.

tasks.name: Replace spark plugs

tasks.name: Fuel injection

tasks.description: Check for leakage. Tighten if necessary. Replace gasket if necessary.
tasks.name: Exhaust  System

tasks.description: Perform dynamic inspection using Yamaha diagnostic tool. Check the error codes.
tasks.name: Diagnostic System Check

tasks.description: Replace.
tasks.name: Replace air filter element.

tasks.description: Check operation, fluid level and for fluid leakage. Correct if necessary.
tasks.name: Clutch

tasks.description: Check operation, fluid level and for fluid leakage. Replace brake pads if necessary.
tasks.name: Front brake

tasks.description: Check operation, fluid level and for fluid leakage. Replace brake pads if necessary.
tasks.name: Rear brake

tasks.description: Check for cracks or damage. Check for correct routing and clamping.
tasks.name: Brake hoses

tasks.description: Check tread depth and for damage. Replace if necessary. Check air pressure. Correct if necessary.

tasks.name: Swingarm pivot bearings

tasks.description: Moderately repack with lithium-soap-based grease.
tasks.name: Swingarm pivot bearings

tasks.description: Check all chassis fitting and fasteners. Correct if necessary.
tasks.name: Chassis fasteners

tasks.description: Apply silicone grease lightly.
tasks.name: Brake lever pivot shaft

tasks.description: Apply lithium-soap-based grease lightly.
tasks.name: Brake pedal pivot shaft

tasks.description: Apply silicone grease lightly.
tasks.name: Clutch lever pivot shaft

tasks.description: Apply lithium-soap-based grease lightly.
tasks.name: Shift pedal pivot shaft

tasks.description: Check operation. Apply lithium-soap-based grease lightly.
tasks.name: Centerstand / sidestand pivots

tasks.description: Check operation and replace if necessary.
tasks.name: Sidestand switch

tasks.description: Check operation and for oil leakage. Replace if necessary.
tasks.name: Front fork

tasks.description: Check operation. Correct if necessary.
tasks.name: Rear suspension link pivots

tasks.description: Change (warm engine before draining).
tasks.name: Change engine oil
tasks.notes:
- Recommended brand: Yamalube
- SAE viscosity grades: 10W-40, 10W-50, 15W-40, 20W-40 or 20W-50
- Recommended engine oil grade: API service SG type or higher, JASO standard MA

Engine oil quantity:
- Oil change: 3.10 L (3.28 US qt, 2.73 Imp.qt)
- With oil filter removal: 3.40 L (3.59 US qt, 2.99 Imp.qt)

tasks.description: Replace engine filter cartridge.
tasks.name: Engine oil filter cartridge

tasks.description: Check coolant level and vehicle for coolant leakage.
tasks.name: Cooling system
tasks.notes:
- Coolant reservoir (up to the maximum level mark): 0.26 L (0.27 US qt, 0.23 Imp.qt)
- Radiator (including all routes): 1.83 L (1.93 US qt, 1.61 Imp.qt)

tasks.description: Change.
tasks.name: Change cooling system
tasks.notes:
- Coolant reservoir (up to the maximum level mark): 0.26 L (0.27 US qt, 0.23 Imp.qt)
- Radiator (including all routes): 1.83 L (1.93 US qt, 1.61 Imp.qt

tasks.description: Check oil level and for oil leakage.
tasks.name: Final gear oil
tasks.notes:
Change at 24000km.

- Type: Yamaha genuine shaft drive gear oil SAE, 80W-90 API GL-5 or SAE 80 API GL-4, Hypoid gear oil
- Quantity: 0.20 L (0.21 US qt, 0.18 Imp.qt)

tasks.description: Change.
tasks.name: Change final gear oil
tasks.notes:
- Type: Yamaha genuine shaft drive gear oil SAE, 80W-90 API GL-5 or SAE 80 API GL-4, Hypoid gear oil
- Quantity: 0.20 L (0.21 US qt, 0.18 Imp.qt)

tasks.description: Check operation.
tasks.name: Front and rear brake switches

tasks.description: Check operation, see Notes for more.
tasks.name: Throttle grip
tasks.notes:
• Check throttle grip free play, and adjust if necessary.
• Lubricate cable and grip housing.
• Lubricate grip warmer wire and wire housing.

tasks.description: Check operation. Adjust headlight beam.
tasks.name: Lights, signals and switches
